description: Retrieves a file from a SMB/CIFS server.

input.name: share
input.description:
The the name of the service to which you want to connect.
Takes the form of `\\server\service`, `//server/service`, or `smb://server/service` where server is the host name or IP address of the SMB/CIFS server, the service is the name of the service offered by the server.

input.name: port
input.description:
The port of the SMB server.
Defaults to `445`.

input.name: domain
input.description:
the domain of which the user is registered.
e.g. `WORKGROUP`.

input.name: username
input.description: The username of the user required to access the specified service on the specified server.

input.name: password
input.description: The password required to access the specified service on the server.

input.name: file path
input.description: The relative path (e.g. `folder\file.txt`) or the absolute path (e.g. `\\localhost\public\folder\file.txt`) of the file to be accessed.
